data.actual_result: The global emoji keeps the colons on the side and doesn't show properly
data.expected_result: The global emoji should parse correctly into an emoji like it does if the same steps are followed with normal emojis
data.short_description: When using the substitute command (s/text/text here) and try to replace text with an emoji, the emoji doesn't parse
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message - Use the substitution command to add a GLOBAL emoji to the end of the message
